title: Chemistry of soapless detergents
creator_credit: Sam Napier-Bell, George Seager, Unilever Films and De La Chevre Films
brief_description: Explains the molecular reaction between water and soapless detergent; molecules; research on the process of synthetization from petrol hydrocarbons. Laboratory demonstration of the production of Alkylbenzene sulphonate basis for a whole range of soapless detergent products for domestic use. Large scale production methods are also shown.
